DOC.detailed_description: MPS II rare , X-linked , lysosomal storage disorder cause deficiency enzyme iduronate-2-sulfatase . Because deficiency , glycosaminoglycans ( GAG ) accumulate multiple tissue organ , result progressive cellular organ system dysfunction . The purpose study determine one year therapy iduronate-2-sulfatase enzyme replacement therapy , dose 0.5mg/kg , weekly every week , safe , result clinically meaningful improvement multiple organ function , compare placebo group . Upon completion study , patient eligible enroll open-label maintenance study .
